titles.title: Health Care Coverage for Displaced Workers Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve the affordability of the health care tax credit, and for other purposes.
Health Care Coverage for Displaced Workers Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Health Care Coverage for Displaced Workers Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the tax credit for the health insurance coverage costs of certain taxpayers (i.e., Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation [PBGC] pension and trade adjustment assistance [TAA] recipients) and their dependents, to: (1) increase the rate of such credit from 72.5% to 80%, and (2) make such credit permanent.
